name: Solar Panel System Model X-200

items.text: Check site conditions and safety requirements
Verify all equipment is present and undamaged
Prepare installation tools and safety equipment
Review installation manual and local codes
Measure and mark panel mounting locations
Run AC wiring to electrical panel

reminders:
Extra items to bring:
- Additional grounding equipment
- Weather sealing materials
- Spare MC4 connectors
- Digital multimeter for testing

Notes:
- Check weather forecast before installation
- Confirm utility interconnection approval
- Take before/after photos for documentation
